#welcome.title: Welcome to Lambent!
#welcome.text:
Follow these steps to started with Office 365 and Teams and set them up on your computer and phone.

You'll need an iOS or Android phone with an active internet connection to get set up. It's easiest if you have this window open on a computer or tablet, but you can follow the instructions on your phone.

Press **Next** when you're ready

#download-authenticator.title: Download the Authenticator App
#download-authenticator.text:
Before you sign in, you'll need to download the Authenticator app on your phone.

Scan the appropriate QR code or use one of the links below to download the app.

#sign-in.title: Sign in to 365
#sign-in.text:
Next, you'll need to sign in to Office 365 using the login details sent to you.
Click on the link below, enter your username and password, then come back to this tutorial.

#set-password.title: Set Your Password
#set-password.text:
Next, you'll need to set a new password.

Paste your old password in the top box, then enter your new password in the two boxes below.

When you're happy, click **Sign in** and move on to the next step here.

#set-up-authenticator-1.title: Set Up Authenticator
#set-up-authenticator-1.text:
You will now be asked to provide more information.

Skip through the first two sections until a QR code appears on screen, then move onto the next step here.

#set-up-authenticator-2.title: Set Up Authenticator
#set-up-authenticator-2.text:
When you open the Authenticator app, it will ask you to agree to the privacy policy. Cick **I agree**.

Next, click on **Scan a QR Code**. The app will ask permission to use the camera - click **OK**.

Point the camera at the QR code on screen until it registers. The Authenticator app might ask you if it can send notifications at this stage - click **Allow**.

When you are done, move onto the next step here.
